title: Torres Natureo Tinto Syrah -Non Alcoholic Red Wine
brief_description: From the leading Spanish viticulture family Torres: Natureo, a top brand in the field of tasty non-alcoholic wines. This brand conquered Europe by storm and offers a gorgeous quality non-alcoholic wine. Once you taste it, you’re sold.
long_description: Torres is one of the most recognizable names in Spanish wine, and is the UK’s leading Spanish brand making up 7% of Spanish exports to the UK. Their big brands: Vina Sol, Vina Esmerelda and Sangre de Toro (with or without the plastic bull!) are found everywhere. And they’re consistently good wines.From this leading Spanish viticulture family Torres now comes Natureo, a top brand in the field of tasty non-alcoholic wines. This brand conquered Europe by storm and offers a gorgeous quality non-alcoholic wine. Once you taste it, you’re sold.

title: Domaine de Fleur Cabernet Sauvignon - Non Alcoholic Red Wine
brief_description: This red wine comes from the producers of Domaine de Fleur. A beautiful, elegant, non-alcoholic wine: excellent value for money.

title: Jillz Cider 0.0%  - Non Alcoholic Cider
brief_description: Enjoy the taste of the summer! Jillz is the non-alcoholic cider made by Dutch brewery Heineken. Great taste and no alcohol!
long_description: Jillz is a mix of cider, barley and water with a fruity flavor. The drink is called a “Sparkling Cider Blend” only this time it contains 0.0 percent alcohol. Jillz is brewed by Heineken, the largest Dutch brewing company.

title: Domaine de Fleur Rose - Non Alcoholic Rose Wine
brief_description: This rose wine comes from the producers of Domaine de Fleur. A beautiful, elegant, non-alcoholic wine: excellent value for money.

title: Domaine de Fleur Blanc - Non Alcoholic White Wine
brief_description: This white wine comes from the producers of Domaine de Fleur. A beautiful, elegant, non-alcoholic wine: excellent value for money.
long_description: A beautiful, semi-dry white wine made from a combination of German Silvaner and Müller-Thurgau grapes. A fruity cuvee wine with a fresh character, delicious as an aperitif or together with exotic dishes and fish.

title: Domaine de Fleur Chardonnay  - Non alcoholic White Wine
brief_description: This white wine comes from the producers of Domaine de Fleur. A beautiful, elegant, non-alcoholic wine: excellent value for money.

title: Domaine de Fleur Merlot - Non Alcoholic Red Wine
brief_description: A robust, superb deep red wine with a beautiful round, full bouquet, dry with typical Merlot notes of blackcurrant. Typical merlot flavours, robust and packed with fruit. Can be beautifully combined with game and meat dishes.

title: Vita Nova Sparkling Secco - Organic Non Alcoholic Champagne
brief_description: This excellent non alcoholic and organic champagne comes from the producers of Domaine de Fleur. A beautiful, elegant, non-alcoholic sparkling wine: just perfect for parties!

title: Eisberg Chardonnay - Non Alcoholic White Wine
brief_description: A great Chardonnay of the German winery Schloss Wachenheim. Drink chilled and enjoy the taste of vanilla and green apple that characterizes this chardonnay!
long_description: Eisberg is one of the oldest available brands and together with Vini Vici the non-alcoholic flagship of the German winery Schloss Wachenheim.

title: Festillant Pamplemousse Sparkling - Non Alcoholic Champagne
brief_description: Great Sparkling Rose Wine from the German winery Schloss Wachenheim. Deliciou    s served cold on summer afternoons!
long_description: Gratien & Meyer is one of the leading winehouses from the French Champagne region and Festillant is their premium quality non alcoholic sparkling wine.

title: Carl Jung Blanc des Blancs Sparkling Chardonnay - Non Alcoholic White Wine
brief_description: A delicious, light Chardonnay sparkling wine by the German pioneers - producing non-alcoholic wine since 1908!
long_description: Carl Jung’s winegrowers have more than  100 years of experience in producing non-alcoholic wines. Founder Jung developed a method to detract alcohol from wine as early as 1908 in the wine castle Schloss Boosenburg. They are known as the pioneers of the non-alcoholic wine industry. Even  100 years later, non-alcoholic wines are still made with love and craftsmanship in the beautiful wine castle Schloss Boosenberg.

title: Vini Vici Chardonnay - Non Alcoholic White Wine
brief_description: A great Chardonnay of the German winery Schloss Wachemheim. Drink chilled and enjoy!
long_description: Vini Vici is the non-alcoholic flagship of the German winery Schloss Wachenheim. The non-alcoholic wine is made up of 70% dealcoholised wine to which grape juice has been added to give the wines more body. The outcome is a festive, open, non-alcoholic wine that goes down easily and is suitable for every occasion.

title: Omi's Apfelstrudel  - The Sensation From Austria!
brief_description: Omi's Apfelstrudel is going to be the sensation from Austria! Taste it and you know why. No added sugar or artificial flavours, just 100% pure taste!
long_description: Just like our Omi, our applestrudel juice is guaranteed 100% Styrian from "Steiermark", the apple growing centre of Austria. Here in Steiermark, Austria we really know our apples - with the first documented apple orchards dating from 1074 at the Benedictine monastery of Admont - our apples are prized for their flavor and exported across the world. Omi is about to conquer the world. Be a pioneer and taste it!

title: Tosselini Spumante ASTI -  Non Alcoholic Sparkling Wine
brief_description: Toselli is an authentic non alcoholic wine, made by one of the largest sparkling wine producers in Italy: Bosca. It is a so called ASTI, a ' spumante ' obtained from Moscato (muscat) grapes.
long_description: Winemaker Luigi Bosca is world famous. He has now made an alcoholic spumante ASTI wine. Important to him is the fact that quality comes before quantity. And it shows in this beautiful non alcoholic wine!

title: Lussory Macabeo & Airen 0.0 Halal -  Non Alcoholic Wine
brief_description: Lussory Tempranillo is an excellent white wine making any moment both unforgettable and special. This great wine contains 0.0% alcohol and is HALAL certified.
long_description: Lussory produces small high-quality batches of non alcoholic wines. Their ultimate secret is a new patented dealcoholisation system that allows the manufacturers to obtain a 100% pure wine, with 0.0% alcohol.

title: Lussory 0.0 Halal -  Non Alcoholic Cava Wine
